diagnosis.final_diagnosis: nonconvulsive status epilepticus due to benzodiazepine withdrawal
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: toxic encephalopathy, infectious encephalopathy, metabolic encephalopathy, psychogenic states
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was supported by the patient's history of stopping alprazolam, observed unusual behavior, an EEG showing generalized spike and slow waves consistent with atypical absence status, and rapid improvement of mental status after treatment with lorazepam.
